boose/BOOSEtests.ForLoopTests.html.summary: Class ForLoopTests Unit tests for for loop execution and control flow. boose/BOOSEtests.IfElseTests.html.summary: Class IfElseTests Unit tests for IF / ELSE conditional execution. Inheritance object IfElseTests Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Namespace: BOOSEtests Assembly: BOOSEtests.dll Syntax [TestClass] public class IfElseTests Remarks These tests verify correct branching behaviour in the BOOSE runtime, including simple IF statements, IF / ELSE constructs, and nested conditional logic. All conditions are evaluated at runtime in accordance with BOOSE execution rules. Methods | Edit this page View Source IfConditionFalse_SkipsIfBody() Verifies that the IF body is skipped when the condition evaluates to false. Declaration [TestMethod] public void IfConditionTrue_ExecutesIfBody() | Edit this page View Source IfElse_ExecutesElseWhenConditionFalse() Verifies that the ELSE branch executes when the IF condition is false. Declaration [TestMethod] public void IfElse_ExecutesElseWhenConditionFalse() | Edit this page View Source IfElse_ExecutesIfWhenConditionTrue() Verifies that the IF branch executes when the condition is true and the ELSE branch is skipped. Declaration [TestMethod] public void IfElse_ExecutesIfWhenConditionTrue() | Edit this page View Source NestedIf_ExecutesInnerElseCorrectly() Verifies that a nested IF statement executes the inner ELSE branch when the outer condition is true but the inner condition is false. Declaration [TestMethod] public void NestedIf_ExecutesInnerElseCorrectly() | Edit this page View Source NestedIf_ExecutesInnerIfCorrectly() Verifies that a nested IF statement executes the inner IF branch when both outer and inner conditions evaluate to true. Declaration [TestMethod] public void NestedIf_ExecutesInnerIfCorrectly() | Edit this page View Source Setup() Initialises a fresh canvas, stored program, and parser before each test. Declaration [TestInitialize] public void Setup() Remarks This ensures that each test executes in isolation and that no runtime state is shared between tests.

boose/BOOSEtests.IntegrationProgramTests.summary: Class IntegrationProgramTests End-to-end integration tests for BOOSE programs. Inheritance object IntegrationProgramTests Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Namespace: BOOSEtests Assembly: BOOSEtests.dll Syntax [TestClass] public class IntegrationProgramTests Remarks These tests validate that multiple BOOSE language features (variables, loops, conditionals, arrays, methods, and canvas commands) operate correctly together within complete programs. Unlike unit tests, these scenarios exercise realistic execution paths across the parser, runtime, and canvas subsystems. Methods | Edit this page View Source Integration_Array_Loop_And_Assignment_WorkTogether() Verifies correct interaction between arrays, loops, arithmetic expressions, and assignments. Declaration [TestMethod] public void Integration_WhileLoop_ModifiesStateAcrossIterations() | Edit this page View Source Setup() Initialises a fresh canvas, stored program, and parser before each integration test. Declaration [TestInitialize] public void Setup() Remarks This ensures that all tests execute in isolation and that no program state or canvas state leaks between tests.

boose/BOOSEtests.VariableAndAssignmentTe.summary: Class VariableAndAssignmentTests Unit tests covering variable declarations, assignments, and expression evaluation in BOOSE programs. Expressions are evaluated and assignments executed at runtime. The tests cover integer, real, and boolean variables, including reassignment and expression chaining. boose/BOOSEtests.WhileLoopTests.html.summary: Class WhileLoopTests Unit tests for WHILE loop execution and control flow in BOOSE programs. boose/BOOSEtests.html.title: Namespace BOOSEtests | mysite
boose/BOOSEtests.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEtests Classes AppCanvasTests Unit tests for the BOOSEappTV.AppCanvas class. AppCommandsTests A test class containing unit tests for core drawing commands and program execution within BOOSEappTV.AppCanvas. ArrayTests Unit tests for BOOSE array functionality. ExpressionEvaluationTests Unit tests for expression evaluation within the BOOSE runtime. ForLoopTests Unit tests for for loop execution and control flow. IfElseTests Unit tests for IF / ELSE conditional execution. IntegrationProgramTests End-to-end integration tests for BOOSE programs. MethodTests Unit tests for BOOSE method declarations and invocation. VariableAndAssignmentTests Unit tests covering variable declarations, assignments, and expression evaluation in BOOSE programs. WhileLoopTests Unit tests for WHILE loop execution and control flow in BOOSE programs. WriteCommandTests Unit tests for the BOOSE write command.
